Read me

  1. For get Wifi SSID, Please grant "Allowed all the time" for App location permissions.
  2. Grant WireGuard permission by adb on Desktop/Laptop.
    adb shell pm grant com.claudejiang.wghelper com.wireguard.android.permission.CONTROL_TUNNELS
Input wifi ssids, split by comma
The WireGuard name configured in WireGuard App
If connected to wifi with these ssids, will turn off WireGuard
